description: Number of 4 X 4 matrices whose determinant is 1 mod n.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
formula: a(n) = n^16/phi(n) * product (1-1/p^4)*(1-1/p^3)*(1-1/p^2)*(1-1/p) where the product is over all the primes p that divide n. Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^(15*e-9)*(p^4-1)*(p^3-1)*(p^2-1). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 18 2001
author: benlove(AT)preston.polaristel.net (Benjamin T. Love)
